/>
VIII.iii.9.B.2.f
.
Establishing Exposure to Pollutants Near NAF at Atsugi, Japan
The Veteran’s exposure to pollutants from a waste incinerator near the Naval Air Facility (NAF) Atsugi can be conceded when the evidence of record verifies service at NAF Atsugi between 1985 and 2001.
Reference
:  For more information on pollutants near NAF Atsugi, see
M21-1, Part VIII, Subpart iii, 9.A.1.g
.
title: M21-1, Part VIII, Subpart iii, Chapter 9, Section B - Processing Claims Based on Exposure to Specific Environmental or Military Occupational Hazards
citation: Part VIII, Subpart iii, Chapter 9, Section B
